hero.title: Antalya Field Pack
hero.subtitle: Designed for seasonal surge conditions, airport pressure, and coast-to-old-town transfer planning.

painPoints: Heat and sun exposure during midday travel

sections.title: Arrival and Entry
sections.summary: Anchor transportation and check-in timing before leaving the terminal.
actions: Set fixed pickup point with host or transport provider.
Avoid first-day itinerary stacking after late arrivals.

sections.title: Mobility and Route Resilience
sections.summary: Coastline moves need buffer because routes compress during peak periods.
actions: Plan one inland fallback route for every shoreline plan.
Reserve evening transfer blocks ahead of time.
Use shorter district loops rather than long point-to-point chains.

sections.title: Payments and Connectivity
sections.summary: Sustain mixed payment reliability across tourist-heavy and local vendors.
actions: Carry split cash reserve by denomination.
Use mobile data package with clear renewal flow.
Store booking proof and support numbers locally.

sections.title: Disruption Playbook
sections.summary: When a route fails, preserve accommodation return certainty first.
actions: Set hard departure thresholds before congestion builds.
Move non-critical activities to walking radius.
Escalate transport changes early, not at final hour.
